name: Orange Seal Tubeless Sealant 8oz with Injector
description: Move into the light; go tubeless. This biodegradable sealant is a blend of fast-setting latex and mixed-sized particles that dam punctures upto ¼-inch quickly and effectively.Includes 237ml bottle of sealant with injector cap and hose.Maintains performance at extreme temperatures and altitudes.Made from biodegradable ingredients.Each half-bottle of sealant adds only 120g of weight to a wheel.
